name: 教えて！goo
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("oshiete.goo.ne.jp"), domain("oshiete1.goo.ne.jp") {
DIV[class="leftMenu_content os-center"],
DIV[class="os-about-bk centertMenu"],
DIV[class="os-pickup"],
DIV[class="today_m"],
DIV[class="today_btn"],
DIV[class="os-banner"],
DIV[class="leftMenu_tl"],

DIV[class="leftMenu_content mobile_bk"],
DIV[class="right_os_tl"],
DIV[class="right_watcher_content"],
DIV[class="banner_left"],
DIV[class="banner_right"],
DIV[class="rightMenu_content_pu"],
DIV[class="rightMenu_reco_qa"],
DIV[class="copy_r"],
DIV[class="oshieteSPLink-bk"],
DIV[class="oshieteSPLink"],
DIV[class="logo"],
DIV[class="plusTitle"],
DIV[class="oshiete-todayWrap"],
DIV[class="recomWrap2"],
DIV[class="ok_relation_images"],
DIV[id="proTitle"],
DIV[id="footnavi"],
DIV[id="Randam-QA"],
DIV[id="new_article"],
DIV[id="useQA_footer"],
DIV[id="notice_special"],
DIV[id="google_ads1"],
DIV DL[class="os-info"],
DIV UL[class="os-guide"],
DIV UL[id="copy"],
P[class="profile_ex"],
P[class="pr"],
P[class="oshieteLogo"],
P[class="mobile"],
TD[bgcolor="#fcfcfc"],
DIV[class="ok_difficulty"] LI[class="ok_condition1"],
DIV[class="ok_difficulty"] LI[class="ok_condition2"],
DIV[class="ok_difficulty"] LI[class="ok_condition3"],
DIV[class="ok_difficulty"] LI[class="ok_conditionvoice"],
LI[class="ok_rss_img"],
LI[class="ok_rss_txt"],
H1[id="oshiete-title"],
DIV[class="os-advertisement"],
DIV[class="oshieteSideMenu-line"],
DIV[class="oshieteSM-categoryWrap"],
DIV[class="ok_button"],
SPAN[id="ok_ad_area_3"] DIV[class="ok_usertool_sbm"],
DIV[id="footer"] DL,
DIV[class="ok_wrapper"] H3,
DIV[id="ok_main"] P,
DIV[id="ok_footer"] HR,
DIV[id="footer"],
DIV[id="plus-CategoryListWrap"] IMG,
SPAN[class="hosoku"],
H1[id="keyword_title"],
P[class="eight_update"],
DIV[class="pink_line"],
P[class="page_ex"],
DIV[id="ok_warning"],
DIV[id="banner"],
IMG[class="banner"],
IMG[alt="ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ"],
IMG[alt="ä»Šæ—¥ã®OKï¼"],
IMG[alt="ã‚ˆã†ã“ãï¼æ•™ãˆã¦ï¼gooã¸"],
IMG[alt="ã“ã®è³ªå•ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹"],
TFOOT,
DIV[id="osiSidemenu"] A IMG
{
display:none !important;
}
DIV[class="leftMenu"], DIV[class="rightMenuIn"],
DIV[class="box"], DIV[class="questionWrap "],
DIV[class="rankingWrap "], DIV[id="oshiete-CategoryLatestQ"],
DIV[id="oshiete-KanrenOther-Link"], H3[class="plus_tit"],
DIV[class="box"] LI
{
border: none !important;
}
SPAN IMG, UL[class="LcategoryLink"] LI IMG 
{
max-width: 0px !important;
}
H3[class="oshiete-McategoryIndex"],
DIV[class="titleRandam-QA"],
DIV[id="ok_sub"],
DIV[id="oshieteSideMenu"],
DIV[class="oshieteSideMenu-bk"],
DIV[class="category-in"],
DIV[class="category-ex"],
DIV[class="box"],
DIV[class="sp-enquete01"],
DIV[id="oshiete-CategoryLatestQ"],
DIV[class="cate_midashi"],
DIV[class="pro_list_ex "] H3,
DIV[class="pro_list_ex blue_bk"] H3,
DIV[class="ListErea"] DIV[class="title"],
DIV[class="smWrap"] UL LI
{
background: transparent !important;
}
DIV[class="hn2"] UL LI A
{
text-decoration: none !important;
}
TR[class="ok_list_bg"] TD 
{
background: #fff7d6 !important;
}
DIV[class="leftMenu_content"] H3[class="plus_tit"] A
{
color: #0030ce !important;
}
}
